text: Melocactus glaucescens is a species of plant in the family Cactaceae. It is endemic to Brazil. Its natural habitats are rocky areas and hot deserts. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== == Sources == * Taylor, N.P. 2002. Melocactus glaucescens. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. Category:Flora of Brazil glaucescens Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Melocactus glaucescens
